name: Michael D. Ernst
content: Michael Ernst's home page Research Publications Software Teaching Students Service Advice Blog Bio Personal Contact Michael Ernst Professor Computer Science & Engineering University of Washington My chief research interest is programmer productivity, including software engineering, programming languages, security, testing, and related issues. Many of my publications and programs are available on-line. I am actively recruiting motivated students who are interested in software engineering, programming languages, security, testing, and related topics. I am interested in new students at both the undergraduate and graduate level.
